Container.Name: web-monitor
Container.Overview: A web monitoring tool that checks a specified webpage for text matches and sends email notifications when matches are found. Perfect for monitoring forums, news sites, or any webpage for specific content. Features configurable search terms, monitoring intervals, and email notifications.
Container.Description:
This container provides a webpage monitoring service with the following features:
- Monitors any specified webpage URL for custom search terms - Searches for multiple terms appearing in the same line - Sends email notifications when matches are found - Tracks previously seen matches to avoid duplicate notifications - Configurable check interval (default 5 minutes) - Supports Gmail and other SMTP email providers - Persistent storage for configuration and logs - Automatic restart on system boot
Configuration: - Website URL: The webpage to monitor - Search Terms: Comma-separated list of terms to search for - Check Interval: Time between checks in seconds - Email Settings: SMTP server details and credentials
The monitor keeps track of previously seen matches to prevent duplicate notifications and logs all activity for troubleshooting.

Config.Name: Search Terms
Config.Description: Comma-separated list of terms to search for

Config.Name: Recipient Email
Config.Description: Email address to send notifications to
